title: Cannibal killer caught by his mum eating boy, 7, he beheaded and chopped up after luring him off street
text:

A horrified mother caught her drug-addled son devouring the corpse of a seven-year-old boy he murdered and beheaded. 
Nazim Miyan was found in a blood-splattered house with the child whose body had been completely mutilated. 
Miyan's mother reportedly stumbled across the gruesome scene at an abandoned home in Pilibhit, northern India. 
The victim's neck, arms and legs were reportedly cut into several pieces while Miyan, described as a local drug addict, allegedly ripped out his stomach and tore off his flesh. 
A policeman , who was sent to the house, said Miyan was sat next to the corpse when officers entered the house and surrendered without any resistance. Miyan's mother discovered the gruesome scene at an abandoned house in Pilibhit, northern India (Photo: Mydrim Jones) 
He said: "The body was lying on the floor with the decapitated head beside it. 
“The skin on the abdomen was missing and internal body parts and bloodstains were scattered across the room.” Read More 'Cannibal' cop killer Stefano Brizzi found dead in jail while serving sentence for murdering officer and dissolving body in acid 
A knife and shovel were recovered from the scene. 
Miyan, aged in his 20s, allegedly lured little Mohammad Monis into the house while he was playing outside with friends. 
The man was taken to a nearby police station where he was charged with murder and abduction. Read More 
Hundreds of furious locals reportedly gathered outside the building demanding Miyan should be killed. 
Sources close to the investigation said Miyan talked "gibberish" during police questioning and admitted nothing. 
He was remanded into custody until he appeared at court in Pilibhit on Wednesday. 
Police officer Devranjan Verma told the Hindustan Times : "We will try to complete the investigation of the case and submit the final charge sheet in court." Like us on Facebook
